ownerships.owner: The Donald J. Trump Revocable Trust

familyMemberEthics.description: Former director/president/chairman of The Trump Corporation, of which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. In 2017, Pres. Trump earned $15,644,624 in management and related fees income from THE TRUMP CORPORATION, valued at Over $50,000,000. Underlying Assets: management company. Location: New York, NY. See attached schedule.
